welcome_subtitle: Select a tool from the sidebar to get started.
ai_stub_greeting: Hello! I am your local AI assistant. I can help you with packaging questions even when you don't have an API key configured.

ai_helper_welcome:
Welcome to the AI Helper!
Ask me about silent switches or command line arguments.
ai_helper_subtitle: Ask me about silent switches, Intune errors, PowerShell, and Winget packages
msi_wrapper_tip: ðŸ’¡ Detected MSI Wrapper! Standard MSI switches may work.
ai_smalltalk_hello: Hello! ðŸ‘‹ How can I help you regarding packaging?
ai_smalltalk_who: I am SwitchCraft AI, your packaging assistant.
ai_smalltalk_what: I can identify silent switches, explain installer technologies, and assist with Intune errors. Just drag & drop a file!
ai_context_msi:
This is an MSI file. You should use standard MSI switches.
Command: msiexec /i "{filename}" /qn /norestart
ai_context_no_switches: I analyzed the file but couldn't find confirmed silent switches. It might not support silent installation.
ai_context_none: I haven't analyzed a file yet. Please drag and drop an installer first.
ai_rules_intune: Intune: Handle return codes (0=Success, 3010=Soft Reboot). Suppress all UI.
ai_rules_error1603: 1603: Generic Fatal Error. Check permissions, existing installs, or prerequisites.
ai_rules_error1618: 1618: Installation in progress. Kill other msiexec processes.
ai_rules_powershell: SwitchCraft can generate PowerShell scripts for you! Check the Analyzer tab.
ai_rules_macos: MacOS Support: DMG (Mount), PKG (Installer), APP (Bundle). I can generate install.sh scripts!
ai_fallback:
I'm a specialized packaging assistant. I can help with:
- Finding silent switches (Drag & Drop a file)
- Explaining installer types
- Intune error codes

Hello! I am your SwitchCraft AI Assistant. ðŸ¤–

intune_config_hint: Please configure Microsoft Graph API credentials in Settings.
settings_channel_desc: Stable: Releases only | Beta: Pre-releases | Dev: Latest commits
ai_tip_extraction: âš ï¸ Tip: Installers using '/S' might be self-extracting archives (7-Zip SFX). If silent install fails, try extracting it first using 7-Zip!
settings_verify_incomplete: Please fill in all 3 fields (Tenant, Client ID, Secret).
settings_verify_success_msg:
Successfully authenticated with Microsoft Graph.
Permissions OK.
Credentials accepted and saved.
confirm_automation_msg:
This will attempt to:
1. Generate & Sign Script
2. Run Local Install/Uninstall Test (Requires Admin)
3. Create IntuneWin Package
4. Upload to Intune

Continue?
config_warning_msg: Intune Upload is NOT configured. Steps will stop after packaging. Continue?
ai_explain_smartscreen: SmartScreen warns about 'Unknown Publisher' if the app is not signed. You can sign it using a certificate in the Release Workflow.
ai_explain_winget: Winget is the Windows Package Manager. SwitchCraft can detect if an installer is available on Winget and generate install scripts for it.
ai_explain_intune: To deploy via Intune, you need to wrap the installer into an .intunewin file. SwitchCraft automates this in the 'Intune Utility' tab.
ai_explain_psexec: Testing as SYSTEM user is crucial because Intune installs run as SYSTEM. Use PSExec (checked in settings) to simulate this.
ai_explain_codes:
Common Exit Codes:
â€¢ 0: Success
â€¢ 3010: Reboot Required (Soft)
â€¢ 1641: Reboot Required (Hard)
â€¢ 1618: Another installation is already in progress.
â€¢ 1603: Fatal Error.
ai_explain_appx:
AppX/MSIX: These are installed using PowerShell.
Command: Add-AppxPackage -Path 'file.msix'
For Machine-Wide: Add-AppxProvisionedPackage -Online -PackagePath ...
ai_explain_logs:
Intune Logs are located here:
C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\IntuneManagementExtension\Logs
The most important file is 'IntuneManagementExtension.log'.
ai_explain_access: Error 0x80070005 (Access Denied) usually means missing Admin privileges or the file is locked by another process.
ai_explain_reboot: If an installer requires a reboot, it often returns 3010. Intune recognizes this and marks the app as 'Pending Restart'.
privacy_note_local: Privacy Note: This AI runs locally. No data leaves your machine.
privacy_note_cloud: âš ï¸ Privacy Warning: Data is sent to {provider} for processing!

help_addons_explanation:
Why Addons?
Some features (Intune upload, deep analysis) are packaged as separate addons to prevent false-positive virus detections by antivirus software. This keeps the core application clean and trusted.
addon_custom_warning_msg:
Installing custom addons can execute arbitrary code.
Only install addons from trusted sources.

Continue?
sync_conflict_msg:
Local and cloud settings differ.
Which data would you like to keep?
github_auth_msg: Open this URL and enter the code:

github_permissions_explanation:
SwitchCraft requests the following GitHub permissions:

â€¢ gist - Create and edit private Gists to store your settings
â€¢ read:user - Read your GitHub username for display

Your settings are stored as a PRIVATE Gist in your GitHub account.
No other data is accessed or stored.
sfx_notice_msg: This is a self-extracting archive. If the main EXE parameters do not work, use one of the nested installers found inside.

This action cannot be undone.

desc_home: Welcome to SwitchCraft. Get started with quick actions and view recent activity.
desc_winget: Browse and deploy thousands of apps from the Winget repository.
desc_analyzer: Deeply analyze installers to find silent switches and configurations.
desc_intune: Package apps into .intunewin format for Microsoft Intune deployment.
desc_intune_store: Manage your Intune apps and assignments directly.
desc_ai: Get intelligent assistance for packaging and scripting tasks.
desc_scripts: Upload and manage PowerShell and remediation scripts.
desc_tester: Live-test detection rules on this machine.
desc_wizard: Step-by-step wizard to go from EXE to Intune Package.
desc_dashboard: View your packaging statistics and recent activity.
desc_stacks: Group apps into stacks for batch deployment.
desc_library: View your analyzed and packaged applications.
desc_groups: Manage Entra ID groups and members.
desc_wingetcreate: Create or update Winget package manifests.
desc_macos: Deploy MacOS apps via Intune shell scripts.
desc_history: View your recent actions and command history.
desc_update_settings: Manage update channels and version settings.
desc_automation: Automate your deployment tasks and schedules.
restart_for_lang: Please restart the application to apply language changes.
exchange_connect_hint: Connect to Exchange Online to view real-time statistics.
